page.title: 13 ******LIFE STYLES******
page.content: { { Public Houses { { { }There are four public houses in Willington. They are;The Willington House, The Green Dragon, The Green Man and The Rising Sun. They all sell ales.The Willington House is a free house:the Rising Sun sells Marstons;the Green Man sells Bass' beer and the Green Dragon sells Ind Coope's. The owner of the Willington House is Mr. Coxen. The Green Dragon is owned by Mr. Greville.The Green Man's owner is John Green and the Rising Sun is owned by Mr. Dalman. In Findern there are two public houses, one is called The Greyhound and the other is called The Wheel.
